Fibbonacci Food Truck and Restaurant


About Us

What's so great about a mathematician from the Middle Ages? Fibonacci created the coolest sequence of numbers in history, where each one equals the sum of the two numbers before it (1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8 - you get it). A thousand years since his death, people have noticed this sequence in nature, applied it in business and architecture, and created music inspired by its pattern. We think that's pretty cool!

For the last 3 years, Fibonacci's has served a sequence of good food to anyone who enjoys a nerdy pun. Now we are expanding to bring you a food truck! Enjoy Fibonacci's at local events or book us for a neighborhood visit or special occasion.

Fibonacci's is owned by Paula Delfino and inspired by her father Raul, a retired teacher who taught with great knowledge in the classroom and a wacky sense of humor everywhere else.



The Fibonacci's Quarterly Menu

Wraps

The Number 1

- Buffalo chicken, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, carrots, ranch, blue cheese

The Other Number 1

- Vegetarian. Hummus, romaine lettuce, sun-dried tomatoes, Kalamata olives, feta cheese, tzatziki sauce

The Number 2

- Jalapeno tortilla, turkey chili, onions, cheddar cheese, avocado

The Number 3

- Smoked salmon, cream cheese, cucumber, dill, and baby spinach

The Number 5

- Marinated pork, pickled carrots, cucumber, cilantro, mint, fresno chiles, mayonnaise

The Number 8

- Vegetarian. Falafel, red onion, romaine lettuce, tomato, and tzatziki sauce

* All wraps, except The Number 2 are served on your choice of flour or corn tortilla.

Sides

Sequence Fries

- Just a side of fries

Cheese Fries

- Fries topped with havarti and dill cheese, pastrami, Russian dressing, pickled onions and peppers, pickled jalapeno

Golden Ratio

- Fries topped with turkey chili and queso blanco

Consecutive Chip

- Tortilla chips and salsa verde

The Mathematician's Favorites

Enjoy Fibonacci's fan favorite menu items at local events or book us for a visit to your neighborhood or for your special occasion.
